scripts.build: esbuild index.ts --outfile=dist/index.cjs --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' && esbuild src/cli.ts --outfile=dist/chunker.mjs --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' --external:tree-sitter* && npm run make-executable
scripts.build:native: cargo build --manifest-path native/searchdb-rs/Cargo.toml --release && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const base='native/searchdb-rs/target/release';const files=['libsearchdb_native.so','libsearchdb_native.dylib','searchdb_native.dll'];for(const f of files){const src=p.join(base,f);if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync('native',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,'native/searchdb_native.node');console.log('Wrote native/searchdb_native.node from',src);process.exit(0);}}console.error('Built library not found in target/release');process.exit(1)"
